targets.query: SELECT sum("kW") FROM "enedisgateway_detail" WHERE ("measure_type" = 'HP' AND "pdl" =~ /^$pdl$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("kW") *$price_HP FROM "enedisgateway_detail" WHERE ("pdl" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "measure_type" = 'HP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT "kW"  / $FROM "enedisgateway_daily" WHERE ("pdl" =~ /^$pdl$/)
SELECT sum("Wh") FROM "enedisgateway_detail" WHERE ("pdl" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "measure_type" = 'HP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("Wh") FROM "enedisgateway_detail" WHERE ("pdl" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "measure_type" = 'HC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("kW") *$price_HC FROM "enedisgateway_detail" WHERE ("pdl" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "measure_type" = 'HC') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("W") FROM "enedisgateway_detail" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("W") FROM "enedisgateway_detail" WHERE ("pdl" =~ /^$pdl$/ AND "measure_type" = 'HP') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30m) fill(none) tz('America/New York')
SELECT value FROM "consumption_load_curve" WHERE ("usage_point_id" =~ /^$pdl$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
